channel.title: can I run this game?
channel.description:
hello, I can easily run Half Life 2 at medium setting with really good fps, should I be able to run Black Mesa, I'm okay with low setting
first gen i5, intel hd 4000

item.title: can I run this game?
item.dc:creator: Crypt
item.description:
I’m gonna go out on a limb and say probably not, at least very well. I’m amazed you play PC games and have what would have been considered mid-end performance 13 years ago . Might be time to look into upgrades, kiddo.

Read full topic

item.title: can I run this game?
item.dc:creator: danielsangeo
item.description:
There are two versions:

  1. The mod for Half-Life 2 (not Half-Life 1) which was released in the latter part of 2012 and is free, but does not and will not include the Xen chapters and will remain how it was released.
  2. The standalone game which is in early access right now and retails at US$19.99 on Steam, and will include the Xen chapters when they’re done and updates including bugfixes.

Read full topic
